paper_abstract: In this paper, some sufficient conditions are derived to guarantee a novel memristive neural network for realizing winner-take-all behavior. Some design methods for synthesizing the winner-take-all behavior based on the memristive neural network are developed by using the obtained results. Finally, simulation results demonstrate the validity and characteristics of the proposed approach.
paper_title: Analysis and design of winner-take-all behavior based on a novel memristive neural network
